title: Emprez BI Module - Report: Absenteeism and Late arrivals per Structure
content: This report allows you to have the following rates, by division, by month, over the desired period:Absenteeism rate Lateness rate (employees start their shifts late)Late departure HH:mm (employees finish their shifts late)This will allow you to compare the different rates and identify the services with the highest rates.Then you can see if these rates are recurring or temporary.Here's what the report looks like: The EMPREZ BI module is available on demand for $1.50/month/employee: request it by opening a ticket!* Available for all manager profiles (Admin, limited admin, manager, limited manager).Only the Report-BI section is not available to the manager and limited manager profiles.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
